data_description.email: The email address used to log in to the SensorPush Gateway Cloud Dashboard
data_description.password: The password used to log in to the SensorPush Gateway Cloud Dashboard

user.description: To activate API access, log in to the [Gateway Cloud Dashboard](https://dashboard.sensorpush.com/) and agree to the terms of service. Devices are not available until activated with the SensorPush app on iOS or Android.
